backend.keyStorage: Key is stored in memory only.
backend.pixaiDescription: Seamlessly combines local tagger results with Ollama's reasoning and captioning capabilities.

errors.geminiKeyRequired: Gemini API Key is required. Please configure it in the settings panel.
errors.ollamaRequired: Ollama Endpoint is required for Pixai mode.
errors.taggerRequired: Local Tagger Endpoint is required for Pixai mode.

info.title: What is Farterrogator?
info.description: Farterrogator is an advanced AI image interrogation tool designed to analyze images and extract detailed metadata, tags, and natural language descriptions. It helps artists, developers, and enthusiasts understand the content of their images and prepare them for further AI processing.

dualModes.title: Dual Analysis Modes
dualModes.description: Choose between Google Gemini for cloud-based state-of-the-art analysis, or Pixai which combines a WD1.4 Tagger with Ollama (Vision Models) hosted on gpu.garden.

naiReady.title: NAI Ready Embedding
naiReady.description: Automatically embed generated tags or descriptions into PNG metadata. The resulting images are "NAI Ready" - simply drag them into NovelAI to autopopulate prompts with the analyzed data.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: In Pixai mode, your images are processed securely on gpu.garden via the Fartcore data center. While not running on your device, your data is handled with strict privacy standards.

gpuGarden.title: GPU Garden Integration
gpuGarden.description: Optimized for use with GPU Garden's infrastructure, allowing for seamless proxying to remote GPU instances for heavy lifting.

howTo.title: How to use
howTo.step1: Upload an image or drag & drop one onto the canvas.
howTo.step2: Select your preferred backend (Gemini or Pixai).
howTo.step3: Adjust confidence thresholds to filter tags.
howTo.step5: Copy tags, or download an NAI Ready PNG to use in your workflow.
